content: दाक्षायण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Coming from the Dakṣa family. --णः A son of Dakṣa. --णं Gold or a golden ornament.

दाक्षायणी [दक्षस्यापत्यं स्त्री इञि फक्ङीप्] {@--1@} Any one of the 27 lunar mansions (they being mythologically regarded as so many daughters of Dakṣa). {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Diti, wife of Kaśyapa and mother of the demons. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Pārvatī. {@--4@} The lunar constellation called Revatī. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kadru or Vinatā. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Aditi, mother of the gods. {@--7@} The Dantī plant.
